channel.title: HackTheBox on Gabriele Abbate
channel.description: Recent content in HackTheBox on Gabriele Abbate

item.title: Perfection
item.description: Initial Scanning and Reconnaissance After scanning the open ports (22, 80) with Nmap, we visit the http page and land here Exploring the Web Application It appears to be a simple weighted grade calculator: When we try to access some files in the file system,we get the following response: Intercepting Requests with Burp Suite Next, we intercept the request with Burp Suite to investigate further: Bypassing Input Sanitization After trying some code injection I noticed that I could bypass the input sanification by going one line down (adding %0a)
